publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2525 Richard Baker: Davidson Mill, Aberdeen—That the Parliament notes with deep regret and concern the announcement by BPB Paperboard of the proposed closure of the Davidson Mill in Aberdeen; notes the significant contribution that the mill has made to employment and the economy in north-east Scotland, currently employing 276 people; calls for a full consultation between the management of BPB Paperboard and trade union representatives at the mill, and urges all relevant local agencies to take the appropriate actions to support staff at the mill at this difficult time and to take action to address the impact of the proposed closure on the local economy.
